message: I would like that users of my app will be able to map subdomains to my webapp
If you use the client against /control/app/[id]/domains/ you'll get a JSON API
or you can do the auth yourself the same way the client does, then request with an "Accept: application/json" header
note that this is an entirely unstable and breaky... I can't guarantee it'll stay like it is until we document it :)
